name: Chapter Outline Generator
description: Generates a detailed chapter outline for a book based on a given topic or premise and the desired number of chapters.

topic.description: The main topic or premise of the book for which to generate an outline.

numChapters.description: The desired number of chapters in the outline. Defaults to 10 if not specified.

outline.description: An array of chapter objects, each containing the chapter number, title, and a brief summary.
